description: LE's Cognitex® Elite is a comprehensive brain health supplement. It supports attention and focus and encourages healthy mood and memory.
cleaned_text: Item # 02396 Attention, focus, mood & memory, hormone-free formula Click to Zoom Click to Zoom Click to Zoom Click to Play Video Cognitex® Elite 60 vegetarian tablets Item # 02396 Attention, focus, mood & memory, hormone-free formula We developed this comprehensive brain health supplement to enhance circulation, support youthful memory & cognition and encourage healthy neurotransmitter function. Very helpful. Will be ordering more. cjgal, CO I will buy again. I use it daily. SHELLIE Keeps you sharp. Ron Frequently Bought Together - This Item: Cognitex® Elite, 60 vegetarian tablets [Immune Senescence Protection Formula](/vitamins-supplements/item02005/immune-senescence-protection-formula), 60 vegetarian tablets What Is Cognitex® Elite SIBELIUS: vinpocetine and Uridine-5'-Monophosphate (UMP). Cognitex Elite® is one of our most comprehensive formulas for brain support, ever. Cognitive health affects what you understand, process & remember. That's why we developed Cognitex® Elite. Cognitex® Elite Benefits - Promotes healthy attention & focus - Encourages healthy mood & memory - Supports brain blood circulation & neurotransmitter levels - Offers potent neuroprotective benefits - Helps inhibit inflammation to promote brain health What is Phosphatidylserine (PS)? Phosphatidylserine (PS) is an essential part of healthy cell membranes. It promotes healthy cognitive function, memory, concentration, attention and more. Why did we add wild blueberry extract? Compounds in blueberry support cognitive health, help maintain already-healthy LDL and blood pressure levels and offer potent antioxidant protection. Whole-Food Blueberry Complex Blueberry phytonutrients can help inhibit age-related decline in cognitive and motor function. Our Cognitex® formulas use a whole-food complex of wild blueberry species from with powerful antioxidant properties. Life Extension - Why Do We Do It? The Best Supplements Science Can Offer When putting something in your body, you should be confident that you're getting the nutritional benefits your body deserves. We've been delivering the highest-quality products—backed by science and formulated with the finest ingredients—for over 40 years. What Matters to You, Matters to Us We're committed to empowering you to live a healthier life. Whether it's finding sustainable partners for our ingredients or funding the latest anti-aging research, we're all about your health & wellness. Highly Recommended 98% of our customers recommend us to family and friends. We're very proud of that because our loved ones matter to us—and we're willing to bet you feel the same way. Product Transparency 40 years of research dedicated to bringing you premium, scientifically-validated formulations. The healthy adult brain is commonly thought to contain as many as 100 billion nerve cells, and you can supercharge their performance with focused nutrition. Cognitex® Elite provides a steady supply of these compounds to support brain health as you age.
